name: Cheeky Beetle And The Unlikely Heroes
detailed_description:
Cheeky Beetle The Worlds Most Modest And Secret Superhero.

A mysterious enemy has assembled a robot army and taken over a peaceful world. The fate of the planet now rests in the hands of a group of creepy crawlies led by ‘Cheeky Beetle’ a shy and unproven beetle superhero. These unlikely heroes must collect all the robot power-cells scattered around 12 different locations in order to slow down the enemy long enough to give the rest of the planet time to organize a resistance.

Take control of Cheeky Beetle the worlds most modest and secret superhero. Move him around mazes in 12 different locations collecting the power-cells used to power the evil robot army. You’ll need to use quick timing and jumps to avoid enemy mechanized robots and even friendly creepy crawlies who want you to prove yourself worthy enough to lead them. Collect power-ups including extra life, extra jump, speed-up, invincibility, pass-through, and enemy slowdown to give to yourself an advantage. Avoid pick-ups such as enemy speed-up, enemy invincibility, and player slow down that will help the enemy. Avoid and even jump over obstacles that fall from the sky or appear from the ground aiding or hampering your movements. Computer controlled towers on each level will shoot at the enemy giving that extra help and with 5 difficulty settings you’ll need it!

12 Different Levels
5 Difficulty Settings
Player Power-ups
Enemy Power-ups
Obstacles
Jump Move
Transporters and Tunnels
Computer Controlled Allied Towers
2 Views
Colour Blindness Settings
Fast Gameplay
Mini-Story
Parental Controls Timer

English with limited language support for: Portuguese(Brazil), Japanese, Spanish, Chinese(PRC), Italian, Korean, German, Dutch, Hindi, Russian and French.

Linux And Mac Versions Coming Soon!

short_description: Take control of Cheeky Beetle the worlds most modest and secret superhero. Move him around mazes in 12 different locations collecting the power-cells used to power the evil robot army. You’ll need to use quick timing and jumps to save the world. A game made by one man.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 duo 2Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8600m 256 Mb or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card Stereo 2.0 or better
  • Additional Notes: Not tested on Windows 8 - Contact me if any problems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 32bit and 64 bit, Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.5 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AND Radeon HD 6800 2Gb or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card Stereo 2.0 or better
  • Additional Notes: Not tested on Windows 8 - Contact me if any problems

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOs Sierra
  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo 2.66Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 320M 256MB
  • Sound Card: 2 Channel Built-in
  • Additional Notes: Only tested on device with these specifications.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOs Sierra
  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo 2.66Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 320M 256MB or better
  • Sound Card: 2 Channel Built-in or better
  • Additional Notes: Only tested on device with these specifications.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Mint 19.1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AND Radeon 6800 2Gb
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card Stereo 2.0
  • Additional Notes: Currently only tested on Linux Mint 19.1 64 bit with system of listed specifications.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint 19.1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.5 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AND Radeon 6800 2Gb or better
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card Stereo 2.0 or better
  • Additional Notes: Currently only tested on Linux Mint 19.1 64 bit with system of listed specifications.

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE SOFTWARE OR FROM OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.

WARNING – PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES AND OTHER KNOWN/UNKNOWN HEALTH/MEDICAL CONDITIONS

A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain kinds of visual images which may include but not limited to flashing lights/images and/or patterns. These may appear in video games and/or other media. People even with no history of epilepsy/seizures may have an undiagnosed condition(s) that may affect/trigger these events while using video games and/or other media.

These seizures/health effects may have a variety of symptoms. THESE MAY INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT NECESSARILY LIMITED TO: dizziness, nausea, altered vision, involuntary movements, twitching, shaking, disorientation, confusion, pain(s). All of which may lead to injury.

IF YOU OR ANY OTHERS EXPERIENCE ANY OF THE ABOVE MENTIONED AND/OR ANY OTHER SYMPTOMS IMMEDIATELY STOP ALL USE AND CONTACT YOUR RELEVANT MEDICAL SPECIALISTS. DO NOT RESUME USE UNTIL CONSULTED BY A QUALIFIED MEDICAL SPECIALIST. PARENTS/CARERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THOSE IN THEIR CARE AND SHOULD MONITOR THEM FOR THE MENTIONED AND/OR ANY OTHER SYMPTOMS.

The risk of health effects may be reduced by taking precautions which may include and/or be not limited to:

Play in a well-lit room/area with good distance between the user(s)/others present and the visual and audio devices.
Do not play if you are tired, drowsy or fatigued.
Do not play for prolonged periods of time.
Rest regularly for every hour of play – for rest duration seek medical specialist advice and also note any legal/governed guidelines relevant for your local area/country.

If you or any of your relatives have a history of seizures, epilepsy, or any other medical conditions consult a doctor before use/playing.
